text: [ Effect of the regimen of kidney-tonifying and qi-invigorating on aging changes of <extra_id_0> glucocorticoid receptor <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ]

The plasma cortisol concentration and the sites of <extra_id_0> glucocorticoid receptor <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> GCR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) in the peripheral lymphocytes were measured in 32 healthy aged persons and 13 young adults .
In animal experiment , <extra_id_0> GCR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> of spleen lymphocytic cell was also measured in 18 aged rats and 9 young rats .

The results showed that <extra_id_0> GCR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was significantly lower in the aged persons or rats than that in the young while the plasma cortisol level did n't change with aging .
So we think that <extra_id_0> GCR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is more sensitive than the plasma cortisol level to reflect the aging change of the adrenal cortex function .

After the treatment with the regimen of Kidney-tonifying and Qi-invigorating , the <extra_id_0> GCR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> of the aged persons and rats was enhanced , and in this way , the function of the aged adrenal cortex was improved .
